column4: UK regulator gives Ryanair deadline to inform passengers of rights

column4: Breakingviews - Ryanair’s cheapskate reputation is its best asset
column5: LONDON (Reuters Breakingviews) - Ryanair is living down to its cheapskate reputation. The budget airline is facing irate passengers and an angry regulator after cancelling more than 20 000 flights over the coming seven months. This combination could be an existential threat for most companies. For the Irish carrier  however  indifference to customers is an integral part of its discount offering.

column4: Breakingviews - Expect buybacks but not M&A from China's Sina
column5: HONG KONG (Reuters Breakingviews) - China's Sina is only likely to produce a qualified victory for activists. U.S. hedge fund manager Aristeia Capital wants the $8 billion web group to consider a sale or a merger with subsidiary Weibo. The former would never get past Chief Executive and Chairman Charles Chao  and the latter is a bad idea. But Chao could compromise by expanding the board  stepping up buybacks and handing out more Weibo shares.

column5: ROME Italy has launched a process that could end with Telecom Italia  being fined for failing to notify Rome that French media group Vivendi  had assumed de facto control of the phone company  a government source said.

column4: UPDATE 2-ArcelorMittal plans $1 bln Mexico investment by 2020 -chairman
column5: MEXICO CITY  Sept 28 ArcelorMittal  the world's largest steelmaker  will invest $1 billion in Mexico over the next three years  in part to boost its North American trade operations  the company said on Thursday.

column4: UPDATE 1-Protest at Wal-Mart owned South Africa business turns violent

column4: Disney  Altice extend deadline to resolve programing dispute
column5: LOS ANGELES The deadline for an agreement on what cable operator Altice USA pays to carry Walt Disney Co's ESPN  ABC  the Disney Channel and other networks has been extended to Sunday from Saturday due to the Yom Kippur holiday  a person familiar with the situation said.
